item.description: I’m learning how to use Hugo as I set up this site.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi, my name is Dottie. Yes, I’m hanging upside down in that picture. I love problem solving. I find aerial arts to be a lot of fun as a mental and physical exercise. Web development is almost as fun. I created this site to help me keep track of late night thoughts much in the same way I take video and notes at the gym. I’ve worked in web development for several years after switching from simulation software.
